## âœ… Checklist

Mark completed items with an 'x'

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new functions

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added inline comments for complex logic

### Testing
- [ ] My changes pass all existing tests
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that no new warnings appear
- [ ] If I added new dependencies, I updated requirements.txt
- [ ] I have verified my changes work with the current dependencies

### Compatibility
- [ ] My changes are backward compatible
- [ ] If not backward compatible, I have documented breaking changes
